about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: Instituto Areluna is a European reference in integrated aesthetics, combining oral health, plastic surgery, dermatology and hair medicine in one place.
about.visionText1: We believe that true beauty is born from the integration of health, well-being and self-esteem. That's why we develop personalized treatments that respect each patient's individuality.
about.visionText2: With a presence in Portugal, Switzerland, France and Luxembourg, our mission is to democratize access to excellent aesthetics, offering natural and lasting results.
about.visionText3: Each treatment is a unique journey, guided by highly qualified professionals and state-of-the-art technology.
